snippet.title: Pita Pizza Pockets
snippet.description: This super-easy after-school snack takes just minutes to prepare, and is the perfect delicious holdover for hungry kids before dinner. Get Anne Coleman's easy, yummy recipe here.

snippet.title: Kanga's Pita Pouch Sandwiches with Garden Egg Salad
snippet.description: Kanga knows a thing or two about keeping little Roo healthy. Stuff your salad into a whole-wheat pita for a tasty twist on the classic.

snippet.title: Individual Veggie-Loaded Pita Pizzas
snippet.description: These mini pizzas are delicious and healthy, and the perfect lunch, student snack or appetizer. Get Cat Cora's terrific recipe here.

snippet.title: Fish Face Pita
snippet.description: Craft fun faces with fish filets. Get the easy recipe here.

snippet.title: Hummus Among Us
snippet.description: Homemade hummus is zingy and wholesome, and wildly inexpensive. It makes an ideal lunch-box addition with a handful of carrot sticks and pita chips, and also makes a great sandwich spread. Give this easy, tasty recipe a...

snippet.title: Cucumber and Yogurt Dip
snippet.description: This easy recipe makes a delicious dip for warm wedges of pita bread or a great sauce for vegetables.

snippet.title: Black Bean Dip
snippet.description: Here's an easy dip to try. For these small and nearly-instant recipes, I use canned beans, and find them perfectly thrifty, happily quick, and acceptably tasty. However, if I'm using a lot of beans -- in a soup, say -- ...

snippet.title: Summer Veggie Melt
snippet.description: Summer vegetables are something we look forward to each year and this pita sandwich melt is full of garden-fresh goodness. Try this healthy recipe for lunch or brunch.

snippet.title: Mediterranean Bento
snippet.description: This Mediterranean-themed bento is packed with red pepper hummus, whole wheat pita, Kalamata olives, red pepper, tabbouleh, stuffed grape leaves and grape tomatoes. Get more bento recipes from Short Order Mom here.

snippet.title: Shepherd's Salad
snippet.description: This chopped salad is fabulous even without the pita chips, which push it into sublime territory. Delicious and healthy, Turkish cuisine is perfect everyday family food.
